# Here are some plots

you can make plots in the same way as always

```{r message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

df = tibble(
  x = rnorm(100, 2, 5), 
  y = 1 +2*x - .5 * x ^ 2 + rnorm(100)
)

df |> 
ggplot(aes(x =x, y = y)) +
  geom_point()
```
